title: UNFPA Highlights Community Action and Fatwas Against FGM in Africa
desc: Olivia Albert, a 19-year-old from Tanzania, experienced female genital mutilation (FGM) at age 14, a practice once considered a normal rite of passage in her community. Speaking to UNFPA, she emphasized the lasting physical and emotional pain she endured and highlighted how survivor-led initiatives are helping shift attitudes. desc: The V-League Mindanao elimination round has opened in Davao City, with winners in the men’s and women’s divisions earning a spot in the 2026 V-League National Finals.

title: The Russian economy is finally stagnating. What does it mean for the war - and for Putin?
